definition: emphasizing or expressing things as perceived without distortion of personal feelings, insertion of fictional matter, or interpretation, a film or TV program presenting the facts about a person or event
details:
adjective
- emphasizing or expressing things as perceived without distortion of personal feelings, insertion of fictional matter, or interpretation
= synonyms: objective
- relating to or consisting of or derived from documents
= synonyms: documental
noun
- a film or TV program presenting the facts about a person or event
= synonyms: docudrama, infotainment
